# sg-form-section



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                  | Type      | Default         |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | --------------- |
| `collapsed`    | `collapsed`     | Whether section is initially collapsed (only if collapsible) | `boolean` | `false`         |
| `collapsible`  | `collapsible`   | Whether section is collapsible                               | `boolean` | `false`         |
| `iconBgClass`  | `icon-bg-class` | CSS class for icon background color                          | `string`  | `'bg-blue-100'` |
| `sectionTitle` | `section-title` | Title of the section                                         | `string`  | `''`            |
| `stepNumber`   | `step-number`   | Current step number (optional)                               | `number`  | `undefined`     |
| `totalSteps`   | `total-steps`   | Total number of steps (optional)                             | `number`  | `undefined`     |


## Slots

| Slot     | Description                      |
| -------- | -------------------------------- |
|          | Default slot for form content    |
| `"icon"` | Icon slot for the section header |
